title: TikTok freaks out over pizza prank
description: Is it a joke or a menu item? Watermelon pizza gets a plug from Domino's. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports.

title: US troops feeling the strain of turning away desperate families at Kabul airport
description: CNN's Sam Kiley reports on the ongoing evacuation effort at Hamid Karzai International Airport in Kabul, Afghanistan, ahead of the August 31 deadline.

title: CDC adds 6 destinations to 'very high' Covid-19 travel risk list, including the Bahamas
description: The Bahamas and Morocco are now among the highest-risk destinations for travelers, according to the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's regularly revised travel advisories list.

title: FDA on latest right-wing Covid drug claims: 'You are not a horse. You are not a cow'
description: Public health officials are aggressively dispelling claims by right-wing media personalities who have been promoting an anti-parasitic drug used for livestock as a potential Covid-19 treatment.

title: The shipping crisis is getting worse. Here's what that means for holiday shopping
description: The vast network of ports, container vessels and trucking companies that moves goods around the world is badly tangled, and the cost of shipping is skyrocketing. That's troubling news for retailers and holiday shoppers.

title: Chilling Afghan voice memo brings photojournalist and Brianna Keilar to tears
description: CNN's Brianna Keilar and photojournalist Lynsey Addario become emotional after hearing a  chilling voice memo from inside Afghanistan.

title: Trump's allies are now denouncing his Taliban deal
description: CNN's John Avlon breaks down how Trump allies' recent criticisms of President Biden's decision to leave Afghanistan ring hollow in light of their past statements.

title: Taliban issue death sentence for brother of Afghan translator who helped US troops, according to letters obtained by CNN
description: The Taliban have sentenced the brother of an Afghan translator to death, according to letters obtained by CNN, accusing him of helping the US and providing security to his brother, who served as an interpreter to American troops.

title: French top-flight league match abandoned after fans invade pitch and clash with players
description: A top-flight French league game between Nice and Marseille was abandoned on Sunday after fans invaded the pitch and a mass brawl broke out, involving players and staff.

title: See latest scene at Kabul aiport as evacuations continue
description: CNN's Sam Kiley reports from Kabul airport as evacuations continue following the Taliban's takeover of Afghanistan.

title: Around 20,000 people remain at Kabul airport as Washington changes its policy on who can be admitted to the facility, a source tells CNN
description: Dozens of US military transport jets were expected to land at Kabul's international airport on Monday, as about 20,000 people remained at the facility awaiting evacuation, a source close to the situation told CNN.

title: Floodwaters in Tennessee overtook residents within minutes
description: As flood waters snaked through Humphreys County in Middle Tennessee Sunday, residents and rescuers worked feverishly to find loved ones following a flash flood Saturday that left at least 21 people dead and about 20 missing.

title: Crews work to restore power for tens of thousands as Henri drenches US Northeast
description: Utility crews are working to restore power to more than 56,000 customers throughout the Northeast after Tropical Storm Henri tore through the region Sunday, causing more than 100,000 customers to lose power at its peak.

title: Here's how to prevent your children from refusing to go to school
description: Shortly after school starts every year, I receive calls from concerned parents of teens and tweens indicating that their child simply refuses to go to school.

title: New Zealand Football reviews 'All Whites' nickname as part of cultural inclusivity project
description: New Zealand Football (NZF) is reviewing its "All Whites" nickname as part of a cultural project run by the organization.

title: China could become the world's first country to control a major Delta outbreak
He needed 72 operations following motorbike crash, but Paralympian says 'body and mind is stronger than you can imagine'
description: Diederick Schelfhout was riding his motorcycle home from training, when everything changed in a flash.

title: From 'air-pocalypse' to blue skies. Beijing's fight for cleaner air is a rare victory for public dissent
description: Beijing was once known as one of the world's most polluted cities, with dense smog and acrid air a daily reality for residents.

title: China could become the world's first country to control a major Delta outbreak
description: • Taiwan's President kicks off rollout of island's first domestically produced vaccine

title: House Democrats gear up for a showdown amid divisions over infrastructure strategy
description: Divisions among House Democrats over how to enact President Joe Biden's sweeping infrastructure agenda are poised to come to a head when lawmakers return to Washington this week, beginning with a key budget vote.

title: Irish tech firm helps kids' voices be heard
description: If you mention "voice technology," most people think of Amazon's Alexa, Apple's Siri or Microsoft's Cortana.

title: 9 national forests close in California as state grapples with drought-fueled wildfires
description: Nine national forests in California are closed Monday as firefighters struggle to contain 11 large wildfires burning in the state.

title: Bitcoin's price rises above $50,000 for the first time since May
description: Bitcoin has surged above the $50,000 mark, as the virtual currency continues to climb out of a months-long slump.

title: Woman describes moment house separated from foundation while family was inside
description: CNN's Pamela Brown talks to Tennessee resident Casey Hipshire about her experience when flash flooding hit her area. The floods have left 21 dead and dozens injured.

title: Trump told crowd in Alabama to get vaccinated. Hear their response
description: Former President Donald Trump appears to get booed by the crowd at an Alabama rally after encouraging attendees to get vaccinated against Covid-19.

title: Australian Prime Minister hints at end to 'Covid zero' amid protests
description: Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison hinted at an end to the country's zero Covid-19 infections strategy in an opinion piece published Sunday, warning Australians to expect a rise in infections as restrictions relax.

title: Video shows anti-lockdown protesters clash with police in Australia
description: Thousands of protesters, angry over fresh Covid-19 restrictions, took to the streets in several Australian cities. Police say they arrested hundreds of people as the protests turned violent. CNN's Angus Watson reports.

title: Biden starts the week with another political headache in a divided House
description: President Joe Biden wants to convince Americans he's in charge and understands the heartache caused by a week of politically damaging chaos in Kabul unleashed by his botched Afghanistan withdrawal plan.

title: Hall of Fame hockey player Rod Gilbert, also known as 'Mr. Ranger,' has died
description: Hall of Fame hockey player Rod Gilbert, fondly known as "Mr. Ranger," died on Sunday. He was 80 years old.

title: Rachel Maddow signed a 'much broader deal' with NBCUniversal. Here's what it means
description: A version of this article first appeared in the "Reliable Sources" newsletter. You can sign up for free right here.

title: Trump and Biden agree on this
description: Almost every US president of the last 70 years has been haunted by the aftereffects of two watershed events: the notorious 1938 "peace in our time" agreement struck at Munich between British Prime Minister Neville Chamberlain and Nazi dictator Adolf Hitler and the 1949 Communist victory in China's civil war.

title: Conservative talk show host Phil Valentine dies after battle with Covid-19, his employer says
description: Phil Valentine, a Nashville-based conservative radio talk show host who had questioned whether it was necessary for all people to get Covid-19 vaccines, died on Saturday, his employer, WWTN Radio, announced on Twitter. Valentine was 61 years old.

title: How NY's first female governor will lead the state, after Andrew Cuomo leaves
description: From Donald Trump to Rudy Giuliani to Andrew Cuomo, New York is a place where big personalities often make it to the top. But the style of leadership they embody certainly has its limitations, and we've seen the downsides of politicians who stay in the executive suite, grow increasingly out of touch and -- worst of all -- behave badly or abusively.

title: Olympic champion runs second-fastest women's 100 meters of all time
description: Olympic champion Elaine Thompson-Herah posted the second-fastest women's 100-meter time in history at the Eugene Diamond League competition Saturday.
